short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds several improvements for efficiency whilst shopping on the Tesco website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds various functionality to the Tesco website, most notably it gives you the ability to manage your own recipes and then quickly search for the ingredients needed.
